reviewText:
Product received for free

Takes me back to my Sega Genesis days.  Very fun side scroller that combines strategy, humor and action.  Hilarious main character and plot make this game a new retro addition to your library you won't regret.

Pros
Great story
plenty of environments and enemies
Works well on a game pad
Strategy filled traps instead of repetitive walk forward and kill
Plenty of weapons

Cons
The some aoe has odd hit detection
You can get stuck in harder puzzles without the needed ammo
voteText: 2 of 20 people (10%) found this review helpful 2 people found this review funny
